name: Petunia and Bartleby Against the World
name_original: Petunia and Bartleby Against the World
description:
A game for 2 players -- one of you (Petunia) controls with WASD (and camera with IJKL) and closes your eyes. The other (Bartleby) directs silently via touch (recommended that you press an imaginary direction pad on Petunia's back).

You can hold spacebar to tell a story, but you don't have to. While spacebar is held down, you may both open your eyes.

IMPORTANT: If Petunia ever has her eyes open *not* during the intro, *or* during the story, both of you lose the game permanently, and cannot replay it (I will know).

Music is "God Only Knows," by the Beach Boys.
